name: addons
description: Addons securely sets your AddonList env vars.

scripts.test: for f in tests/*; do echo "$f"; node "$f"; done; echo 'passed!'; exit 0

readme: # Node.js module for AddonList Using this module you can dynamically download your sevice api keys from AddonList ## Install Stop your node server if it is running. Run this in your terminal: ``` shell npm install addons ``` Add this to your javascript, server.js or otherwise: ``` javascript var addons = require('addons'); addons(); ``` Set environment variables and restart your server: ``` javascript ADDONS_API_ID='app_74c6e4f2-c8dd-41e1-b133-876c4ce6c6f7' ADDONS_AUTH_TOKEN='V2Naw103kivzMXj_Afw7cw' node server.js ``` ## Heroku install Run this in your terminal when your AddonList settings change (anytime addons.json is updated): ``` shell rake addons:heroku:push ``` Test App repo
